(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP A))
    (VP (VBD bit)
      (ADVP (RB late)))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(bit-2, A-1)
root(ROOT-0, bit-2)
advmod(bit-2, late-3)


(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB just))
    (VP (VBD got)
      (NP
        (NP (NN hold))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN article))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (NNP Travel) (NNP +) (NNP Leisure) (NNP SEA) (NNP Sep) (NNP 2011) (NN issue))))))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB where))
        (S
          (NP (PRP they))
          (VP (VBD featured)
            (NP (PRP$ my) (NN book))
            (PP (IN as)
              (NP
                (NP (CD one))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (CD four) (NNS books)))))
            (PP (IN by)
              (NP
                (NP (NNS bloggers))
                (VP (VBN turned)
                  (NP (NNS authors)))))))))
    (. !)))


cc(got-4, but-1)
nsubj(got-4, I-2)
advmod(got-4, just-3)
root(ROOT-0, got-4)
dobj(got-4, hold-5)
prep(hold-5, of-6)
det(article-8, the-7)
pobj(of-6, article-8)
prep(article-8, in-9)
nn(issue-16, Travel-10)
nn(issue-16, +-11)
nn(issue-16, Leisure-12)
nn(issue-16, SEA-13)
nn(issue-16, Sep-14)
nn(issue-16, 2011-15)
pobj(in-9, issue-16)
advmod(featured-19, where-17)
nsubj(featured-19, they-18)
advcl(got-4, featured-19)
poss(book-21, my-20)
dobj(featured-19, book-21)
prep(featured-19, as-22)
pobj(as-22, one-23)
prep(one-23, of-24)
num(books-26, four-25)
pobj(of-24, books-26)
prep(featured-19, by-27)
pobj(by-27, bloggers-28)
partmod(bloggers-28, turned-29)
dobj(turned-29, authors-30)
